sn35.134:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava sakkesu viharati devadaham nama sakyanam nigamo.
sn35.134:1.3: “naham, bhikkhave, sabbesamyeva bhikkhunam chasu phassayatanesu appamadena karaniyanti vadami, na ca panaham, bhikkhave, sabbesamyeva bhikkhunam chasu phassayatanesu nappamadena karaniyanti vadami.
sn35.134:1.4: Ye te, bhikkhave, bhikkhu arahanto khinasava vusitavanto katakaraniya ohitabhara anuppattasadattha parikkhinabhavasamyojana sammadannavimutta, tesaham, bhikkhave, bhikkhunam chasu phassayatanesu nappamadena karaniyanti vadami.
sn35.134:1.6: Katam tesam appamadena, abhabba te pamajjitum.
sn35.134:1.7: Ye ca kho te, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sekkha appattamanasa anuttaram yogakkhemam patthayamana viharanti, tesaham, bhikkhave, bhikkhunam chasu phassayatanesu appamadena karaniyanti vadami.
sn35.134:1.9: Santi, bhikkhave, cakkhuvinneyya rupa manoramapi, amanoramapi.
sn35.134:1.10: Tyassa phussa phussa cittam na pariyadaya titthanti.
sn35.134:1.11: Cetaso apariyadana araddham hoti viriyam asallinam, upatthita sati asammuttha, passaddho kayo asaraddho, samahitam cittam ekaggam.
sn35.134:1.12: Imam khvaham, bhikkhave, appamadaphalam sampassamano tesam bhikkhunam chasu phassayatanesu appamadena karaniyanti vadami …pe…
sn35.134:1.13: santi, bhikkhave, manovinneyya dhamma manoramapi amanoramapi.
sn35.134:1.14: Tyassa phussa phussa cittam na pariyadaya titthanti.
sn35.134:1.15: Cetaso apariyadana araddham hoti viriyam asallinam, upatthita sati asammuttha, passaddho kayo asaraddho, samahitam cittam ekaggam.
sn35.134:1.16: Imam khvaham, bhikkhave, appamadaphalam sampassamano tesam bhikkhunam chasu phassayatanesu appamadena karaniyanti vadami”ti.
